section.heading: Glossary Configuration
section.help: Glossary words or terms are defined so that the translation service will not translate them. This is useful for proper nouns, technical terms, or other words that should not be translated.

terms.current: {count, plural, one {# term} other {# terms}} currently defined

glossary.no_terms: No glossary terms are currently defined.
glossary.extender_info: Glossary terms can be added using the extension's PHP extender in your extend.php file.
glossary.create_not_implemented: Creating terms via UI is not yet implemented. Use the PHP extender.
glossary.edit_not_available: This term is defined in code and cannot be edited via UI
glossary.delete_not_available: This term is defined in code and cannot be deleted via UI

permission.refresh-translation: Force a re-translate of a cached translation
permission.translate-to-all-locales: View translation in any forum locale

general.heading: General Settings
general.help: These settings control the general behavior of the translation system.

seo.heading: SEO Settings
seo.help: These settings control the behavior of the translation system with respect to search engine optimization.
seo.default-lang-help: When enabled, the forum default language will be added to the path for the x-default hreflang tag.

providers.heading: Translation Provider Settings
providers.help: Select your preferred translation provider and configure its settings here.

settings.seemless-help: Beta feature. When enabled, all user content will be translated automatically to all other available forum languages. When a user views multi-language content, translations will be displayed automaticlly.
settings.multi-lang-search-help: When enabled, the search will include all translations of the content.
settings.short-content-length-help: When enabled, content that is shorter than the specified length will be translated and assumed to be written in the current language of the UI. 0 disables this feature.

api_key.help: Register at {link}. Driver will auto detect free/pro key type.
api_key.label: => ianm-translate.lib.settings.api-key

en_choice.help: When translating to English, select which variant should be used.
en_choice.label: English variant

formality.help: Where available, translations can use different levels of formality. Select your preference here.
formality.label: Formality

model_type.help: Select which DeepL model to use for translation.
model_type.label: Model type

pair.label: {source} to {target} Glossary
pair.help: Select a glossary when translating {source} to {target}, or select none if no glossary is needed for this language pair.

api_key.help: Register for an API key at {link}. This driver uses the V2 API - Basic.
api_key.label: => ianm-translate.lib.settings.api-key

api_key.help: Register for an API key at {link}. This driver supports GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini models.
api_key.label: => ianm-translate.lib.settings.api-key

translation_model.help: Select which OpenAI model to use for translations. GPT-4o provides the highest quality, GPT-4o-mini offers good balance, and GPT-3.5-turbo is the most cost-effective.
translation_model.label: Translation model

detection_model.help: Select which OpenAI model to use for language detection. GPT-3.5-turbo is recommended as language detection is a simple task that doesn't require the most powerful model.
detection_model.label: Language detection model

de_variant.help: When translating to German, select which variant should be used.
de_variant.label: German variant

en_variant.help: When translating to English, select which variant should be used.
en_variant.label: English variant

max_tokens.help: Maximum tokens for translation output. Higher values allow longer translations but increase costs. 1024 tokens â‰ˆ 750 words. GPT-4o costs ~$0.03 per 1K output tokens, GPT-4o-mini costs ~$0.0006 per 1K output tokens.
max_tokens.label: Max output tokens

timeout.help: Request timeout in seconds. Increase if you experience timeout errors.
timeout.label: Timeout (seconds)

settings.translate-all-help: When enabled, admin users and others with permission may translate content to any installed forum language.
settings.bind-browser-language-help: When enabled, the user's browser language(s) will be added to the list of languages available for translation.
settings.use-native-locale-names-help: When enabled, the native locale name will be used instead of the current locale version of the name.
settings.translate-polls-help: When enabled, the poll title, subtitle, image alt text and answer options will be automatically translated when a poll is created or edited.
settings.translate-quiz-help: When enabled, the quiz title, subtitle, correct answer explanation and answer options will be automatically translated when a quiz is created or edited.
settings.readme-info: See the README documention for extended information.
settings.readme-none: No additional settings are required for this driver.

post.translation-error: There was a problem displaying the translation of this post. The error has been logged with ID {uuid}. Please report this if the problem persists.

source-language.help: When disabled, only translatable content written in a language other than the current forum language will be labelled. To label all content with it's detected language, enable this setting.
source-language.label: Always show language
